entry.meaning: {ṅa} the 5th consonant of the Sanskṛit alphabet, nasal of the 1st class. No word in use begins with this letter
it is usually found as the 1st member of a conjunct consonant preceded by a vowel
{ṅa} m. an object of sense L.
desire for any sensual object L.
{ṅu} cl. 1. Ā. {ṅavate}, to sound Dhātup. xxii, 57: Desid. {ñuṇūṣate} Pāṇ. 7-4, 62 Sch.
